channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Kalshi hits $5B valuation days after rival Polymarket gets $2B NYSE backing at $8B
item.description: Prediction markets startup Kalshi raised $300 million, while Polymarket nabbed up to $2 billion.

item.title: Why Deloitte is betting big on AI despite a $10M refund
item.description: AI companies are making their much-anticipated enterprise plays, but the results are wildly inconsistent. Just this week, Deloitte announced it’s roll...

item.title: Google Search Could Change Forever in the UK
item.description: New regulation from the UK’s competition authority means Google may be forced to make major changes in the way that people use its search engine.

item.title: WIRED Roundup: Are We In An AI Bubble?
item.description: In this episode of Uncanny Valley, we talk about one author's journey to flee the US, social media surveillance, chatbots and the world of AI, and con...

item.title: These SteelSeries Earbuds Are Great for Gaming and Are 35% Off Right Now
item.description: You might be surprised to find out how capable the SteelSeries Arctis GameBuds are.

item.title: The Best Google Pixel Phones of 2025, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Here’s a guide to all the models—plus Pixel case recommendations and smart software tricks to try.

item.title: Google Chrome silences those pesky notifications
item.description: The company tacitly admits that browser notifications, as designed, might have been a bad idea, saying that its own data shows users receive a high vo...

item.title: Prezent raises $30 million to acquire AI services firms — starting with founder’s other company
item.description: Months after raising $20 million, enterprise-focused AI presentation startup Prezent is raising $30 million for acquisitions.

item.title: The billion-dollar infrastructure deals powering the AI boom
item.description: Here's everything we know about the biggest AI infrastructure projects, including major spending from Meta, Oracle, Microsoft, Google, and OpenAI.

item.title: The Shutdown Is Pushing Air Safety Workers to the Limit
item.description: Federal employees say that flying is still safe despite the strain on air traffic controllers. But expect even more airport delays ahead.
